flavorText:
"Seeing so much easy prey makes her crazy. See how she snorts and drools?"
—Dhuuz, kronch wrangler

foreignData.flavorText:
„Es wird ganz verrückt, wenn es so viel leichte Beute sieht. Schau nur, wie es schnaubt und sabbert!"
—Dhuuz, Kronch-Treiber
foreignData.name: Tobendes Kronch
foreignData.text: Das Tobende Kronch kann nicht alleine angreifen.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ver tanta presa fácil la vuelve loca. ¿Ves cómo brama y babea?".
—Dhuuz, domador de kronch
foreignData.name: Kronch enfurecida
foreignData.text: La Kronch enfurecida no puede atacar sola.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Voir toutes ces proies faciles le rend fou. Vous avez vu comme il grogne et il bave ? »
—Dhuuz, dompteur de kronch
foreignData.name: Kronch enragé
foreignData.text: Le Kronch enragé ne peut pas attaquer seul.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Vedere così tante prede facili la fa impazzire. Vedi come sbuffa e sbava?"
—Dhuuz, domatore di kronch
foreignData.name: Kronch Furiosa
foreignData.text: La Kronch Furiosa non può attaccare da sola.

foreignData.flavorText:
「獲物がたくさんいるのを見て興奮しているんだ。あの鼻息とよだれが分かるだろ？」
――クロンチの世話人、ドゥーズ
foreignData.name: 怒り狂うクロンチ
foreignData.text: 怒り狂うクロンチは単独では攻撃できない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ビースト

foreignData.flavorText:
"저 녀석은 손쉬운 사냥감을 보면 미쳐 날뛴다구. 킁킁대면서 침 흘리는 거 보여?"
—크론치 조련사, 두즈
foreignData.name: 성내는 크론치
foreignData.text: 성내는 크론치는 혼자 공격할 수 없다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ela fica louca com tanta presa fácil. Viu como ela está bufando e babando?"
— Dhuuz, peão de kronch
foreignData.name: Kronch Enfurecido
foreignData.text: Kronch Enfurecido não pode atacar sozinho.

foreignData.flavorText:
«От такого количества легкой добычи у него голову срывает. Видишь, как он фыркает и капает слюной?»
— Дхууз, загонщик крончей
foreignData.name: Буйный Кронч
foreignData.text: Буйный Кронч не может атаковать в одиночку.

foreignData.flavorText:
「看到遍地猎物唾手可及让她兴奋不已。看见她喷响鼻流口水了吗？」
～恐骐兽驯师杜兹
foreignData.name: 狂怒恐骐兽
foreignData.text: 狂怒恐骐兽不能单独进行攻击。

foreignData.flavorText:
「看到遍地獵物唾手可及讓她興奮不已。看見她噴響鼻流口水了嗎？」
～恐騏獸馴師杜茲
foreignData.name: 狂怒恐騏獸
foreignData.text: 狂怒恐騏獸不能單獨進行攻擊。

name: Raging Kronch

rulings.text: Raging Kronch can be declared as an attacker only if another creature is declared as an attacker at the same time. Once it’s attacking, removing the other creature won’t cause Raging Kronch to stop attacking.
If you control more than one creature that can’t attack alone, they can attack together, even if no other creatures attack.

Although Raging Kronch can’t attack alone, other attacking creatures don’t have to attack the same player or planeswalker. For example, Raging Kronch could attack an opponent and another creature could attack a planeswalker that opponent controls.
If a creature that can’t attack alone also must attack if able, its controller must attack with it and another creature if able.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Raging Kronch can attack along with a creature controlled by your teammate, even if no other creatures you control attack.
